long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The WorkLLama Messaging Extension for Chrome enables recruiters to communicate with candidates and other contacts through SMS, Chat or WhatsApp. The extension supports both 1:1 and broadcast message and integrates with all major ATS software including WorkLLama’s ATS and engagement application. The messages are synchronised between WorkLLama's mobile application, web application and chrome extension. You can also switch between your business phone numbers on-the-go and communicate with candidates seamlessly. 
 
•	Customise your reach-outs using features such as attachments, emojis, message templates, dynamic fields, signatures, and scheduled messages.    
•	Send 1:1 or broadcast messages to multiple recipients, using your preferred methods such as SMS, Chat, or WhatsApp.
•	Use the recruiter hub feature to switch between your business phone numbers and provide a unique and coherent experience for candidates.
•	Easily access your saved contacts and candidates or create new contacts and candidates with a single click.
